hero.title: Make mining enjoyable again
hero.description: Ever gotten tired of mining endlessly with no goal in mind? No motivation to go strip-mining? No means to go on this repetitive task for ores? Well, this data pack aims to change exactly that.

treasures.title: Custom treasures
treasures.description: This data pack introduces a whole new way of approaching mining with a huge reward system. Treasure has a chance to spawn when mining a stone-related block. These treasures are divided into several different tiers: Common, Rare, Epic and Legendary.

biomes.title: Biome specific
biomes.description: There are biome-specific treasures depending on which biome the player is in, which also motivates different bases in different biomes.

items.title: Custom items
items.description: This data pack includes over 80+ loot tables with custom armor, custom weapons, custom food, custom advancements and custom utility items and randomized stats, making many items feel unique.

advancements.title: Advancements
advancements.description: There is a custom advancement system with 201 new advancements! This data pack introduces an insane addition of new achievements designed around the new custom features this data pack provides.

1.text: So much content, I can tell a lot of work went into this, very impressive!
1.author: Kefaku

2.text: I love this pack so much. Mining is one of those grindy things in minecraft I used to hate so much but now it's got such an allure!
2.author: ThatwitchyPlayr

3.text: The biome-specific treasures are amazing! It gives me a reason to explore and build bases in different biomes. Best mining pack ever!
3.author: prodbyeagle

4.text: The custom items and advancements add so much depth to the game. Every mining session feels like a treasure hunt now!
4.author: Technoblade

realms.name: Realms
realms.description: If you have the data pack on realms you may notice that the overworld treasure are not working sometimes. This is due to Realms renaming every folder containing "World" to match the Realm's name, affecting data pack folders. The overworld folder gets renamed to over(REALMS NAME). We hope Mojang patches this in a future update.

spigot.name: Spigot
spigot.description: Not recommended for multiple data packs. Due to Spigot's NBT placement blocking, containers with NBTs (like chests with loot) won't contain loot when placed. For other issues, please join our Discord.

papermc.name: PaperMC
papermc.description: No inconsistencies as of yet. However, if there are, please report it on our Discord.

fabric.name: Fabric
fabric.description: Personally recommended for data packs as it performs very similar to Vanilla. Report any issues on our Discord.

forge.name: Forge
forge.description: Limited testing done, but no issues discovered so far.

quilt.name: Quilt
quilt.description: Similar to Fabric. Limited testing, but due to Fabric-like architecture, we expect good compatibility.

other.name: Other
other.description: For any other plugin/mod-related compatibility issues, please report them on our Discord for potential resolution in future updates.

footer.title: Mine Treasure
footer.description: Discover hidden treasures across Minecraft's vast biomes.

download.title: Download Mine Treasure
download.subtitle: Choose your preferred platform to download Mine Treasure. Make sure to read the installation instructions for your specific platform.

modrinth.title: Modrinth
modrinth.description: Download from Modrinth, a community-driven Minecraft mod repository.

steps.title: Download the Datapack
steps.description: Click the download button above to get the latest version from Modrinth.

steps.title: Locate Your World Folder
steps.description:
Navigate to your Minecraft world folder:
- Windows: %appdata%/.minecraft/saves/[world name]
- macOS: ~/Library/Application Support/minecraft/saves/[world name]
- Linux: ~/.minecraft/saves/[world name]

steps.title: Install the Datapack
steps.description: Find the "datapacks" folder in your world folder. If it doesn't exist, create it. Then, drag and drop the downloaded .zip file into this folder.

steps.title: Load the Datapack
steps.description: If you're installing this on an existing world, type /reload in the game. For a new world, the datapack will load automatically when you create the world.

steps.title: Verify Installation
steps.description: Type /datapack list to confirm that "Mine Treasure" is listed and enabled.

needHelp.title: Need Help?
needHelp.description: Having trouble with installation or encountered a bug? Join our Discord community for support!
